meanings.definition: Resembling a worm in shape or movement.
meanings.sent1: The long, thin creature had a wormlike appearance as it slithered across the ground.
meanings.sent2: The garden hose was so flexible and wormlike, making it easy to maneuver around obstacles.
meanings.sent3: The wormlike dance moves of the performer brought laughter to the audience.
meanings.sent4: Her handwriting was so squiggly and wormlike, it seemed to wiggle off the page.
meanings.sent5: The tunnel was dark and narrow, with a wormlike shape that made it difficult to navigate.
